name: Neon Rampage - 1.1.3
description:
You control a flashy spaceship with a captain that doesn't know how to stop. You can control him by dragging him around the screen. While enemies come raining down it is your job to stay alive and kill as many as possible. Collect coin to spend in the shop or buy new skins for you space and bullets. Try to go as far as possible and submit your score to the GameJolt database. Seek out all the trophies and achievements while your at it. Had enough? Just close the game and continue whenever you want. Your scores, coins and upgrade are safely saved somewhere, where noone will find them. The colorful graphic will give you an intense yet soothing feeling.

Remember! Don't get hooked, because I am.

This game is still in heavy development and is far from finished.

What to expect:
[Checklist here]

Controls:
- Click & Drag your ship to shoot and move
- ESC to open the shop
- 1 - 9 to buy the available upgrades (In Shop)

Any suggestions? Send me a message. If you like the game consider a tip to support me.
